com.hybris.cis.api.tax.service

Interface TaxService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CisService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AvalaraTaxService, CyberSourceTaxService, MyTaxServiceImpl, TaxServiceMockImpl, VertexTaxService

    public interface TaxService
extends CisService
    The tax calculation service is used to quote, post and invoice taxes. Tax calculation requires order details including line items and a shipping address.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CisTaxDoc adjust(CisOrder order)
      Adjusts a previously created invoice.
      CisTaxDoc cancel(java.lang.String docId)
      Cancels a previously created tax document.
      CisTaxDoc exists(java.lang.String docId)
      Checks if a specified invoice already exists.
      CisTaxDoc invoice(CisOrder order)
      Creates an invoice based on the provided order details.
      CisTaxDoc post(CisOrder order)
      Submits taxes for the given order.
      CisTaxDoc quote(CisOrder order)
      Returns a tax quote for the order.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.hybris.cis.api.service.CisService

        getId, getType, testConnection

    • Method Detail

      • quote

        CisTaxDoc quote(CisOrder order)
        Returns a tax quote for the order.
        Parameters:
        order - The order details to get the quote for
        Returns:
        A tax document

      • post

        CisTaxDoc post(CisOrder order)

        Submits taxes for the given order.

        Taxes can be posted when the order is placed, which will create a persisted tax document for later reference.

        Parameters:
        The - order details to post taxes for
        Returns:
        A tax document

      • cancel

        CisTaxDoc cancel(java.lang.String docId)

        Cancels a previously created tax document.

        Parameters:
        docId - ID of a tax document
        Returns:
        A tax document

      • invoice

        CisTaxDoc invoice(CisOrder order)

        Creates an invoice based on the provided order details.

        Invoiced orders can no longer be adjusted or cancelled.

        Parameters:
        order - The order details to create the invoice for
        Returns:
        A tax document

      • adjust

        CisTaxDoc adjust(CisOrder order)
        Adjusts a previously created invoice. The order should contain the line items that need to be removed from the invoiced tax doc. This function is typically used for the case where line items are returned.
        Parameters:
        order - Order details including line items to remove/adjust
        Returns:
        A tax document

      • exists

        CisTaxDoc exists(java.lang.String docId)
        Checks if a specified invoice already exists.
        Parameters:
        docId - ID of a tax document
        Returns:
        A tax document with an ID and location if the invoice exists, otherwise an empty tax document
